attributes.action: There's nothing on tv so scrap the tv tax (i mean licence.)
attributes.additional_details:
Tv is complete rubbish and everybody knows it.It is completely unfair to make someone pay for a service which they might not want.

The BBC is no better than the commercial stations ,so why pay ??

Also in this digital age there are ways to encrypt the service so people who pay can have and people who don't can spend their £140 on something useful.
